channel.title: Help a Dairy Cop :(
channel.description:
My router (Belkin Wireless G, Model number doesn't matter, interface is the same anyway) is deciding to be homo and despite the ports I tell it to open, still blocks connections on said ports.
I opened the ports I wanted for both UDP and TCP, nothing. I setup a DMZ for the computer I want the ports to be open on, nothing.
Please help? :(

item.title: Help a Dairy Cop :(
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

I have the same problem, but with a d-link router.

Read full topic
